body_html: Is it possible that you had . in your $PATH or $path (in csh)? That's not advised for security reasons, and it might confuse virtualenv which is using your system versions of software (which is probably found by using $PATH).
body_text: Is it possible that you had . in your $PATH or $path (in csh)? That's not advised for security reasons, and it might confuse virtualenv which is using your system versions of software (which is probably found by using $PATH).
body: Is it possible that you had . in your $PATH or $path (in csh)? That's not advised for security reasons, and it might confuse virtualenv which is using your system versions of software (which is probably found by using $PATH).
